Changelog
==========================

0.9.1
--------------------------
Beta ig

1.0.0
--------------------------
Initial Release

1.0.3
--------------------------
Fix to only return JSON payload on status code 200, raise Exception otherwise just in case

1.0.4
--------------------------
Fix to check locally if the user is attempting to access a token-required endpoint without a token, rather than relying on the server to return a 401
